page.title: LogNetUI
page.descr: Text needed by this mod for GUI
page.t: Pick %s; remember to also pick another station to pair/unpair logistics links.
Cancel logistics link pairing/unpairing and releases the pick on %s.
Unpair %1 and %2, removing the bi-directional logistics link if it currently exists.
Pair %1 and %2, forming a new bi-directional logistics link if it does not exist yet.
